title: Hindu and Sovereign HOFers and SLers (and a bunch of other stuff)
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Hindu and Sovereign HOFers and SLers (and a bunch of other stuff)
posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

I've made a few purchases lately and need to sell a few cards.  These are some tougher backs that I've accumulated over the last few years.  Some of them took me quite awhile to find.

Paypal f/f only please.  Offers welcome, although I don't have much wiggle room on a lot of these.

Please add $2.50 for shipping.  Any purchases over $100 ship for free.

Clarke batting Hindu BVG 1 $275
